C E F L M P R S U 

C

create() - Static method in class SocialClient
Guides the user through creating a new profile in the system.

E

edit() - Static method in class SocialClient
Guides the user through editing a profile.

F

follow() - Static method in class SocialClient
Guides the user through adding one "following" connection (making one profile follow another).

L

list() - Static method in class SocialClient
Lists the profiles in the system for the user to choose between.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class SocialClient
Runs the toy social media application.

P

pick() - Static method in class SocialClient
Guides the user through picking a profile from the list.
pick(String) - Static method in class SocialClient
Guides the user through picking a profile from the list.

R

recommend() - Static method in class SocialClient
Prompts for a profile, then recommends another profile for the chosen profile to follow.

S

show() - Static method in class SocialClient
Shows the details of one profile.
SocialClient - Class in <Unnamed>
SocialClient is a toy application for simulating the connections between profiles in an asymmetric (i.e., following) social network.
SocialClient() - Constructor for class SocialClient
 

U

unfollow() - Static method in class SocialClient
Guides the user through removing one "following" connection (making one profile unfollow another).
